text: was a district located in Okayama Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the district had an estimated population of 15,872 and a density of 514.32 persons per km². The total area was 30.86 km². ==Towns and villages== * Nadasaki ==Merger== * On March 22, 2005 - the town of Nadasaki, along with the town of Mitsu (from Mitsu District), was merged into the expanded city of Okayama Category:Former districts of Okayama Prefecture
title: Kojima District, Okayama
